title: Pharmacy Services
tagline: Your health, our expertise in every prescription.
overview: Comprehensive pharmacy care offering safe medication dispensing, consultations, and wellness support for all patients.
detailedDescription: Our pharmacy ensures personalized medication management, vaccination services, and expert counseling to optimize your health outcomes.

features.title: Medication dispensing and management
features.description: Accurate dispensing of prescriptions with guidance on usage and interactions.

features.title: Vaccinations and preventive care
features.description: Immunization services for children and adults to prevent diseases.

doctors.name: Dr. Jane Doe
doctors.title: Pharmacist
doctors.bio: Dr. Jane Doe is a licensed pharmacist with over 10 years of experience in community pharmacy, specializing in medication therapy management and patient education.

doctors.name: Dr. John Smith
doctors.title: Pharmacist
doctors.bio: Dr. John Smith is a clinical pharmacist with expertise in chronic disease management and a passion for improving patient outcomes through personalized medication plans.

testimonials.name: Sarah Johnson
testimonials.title: Satisfied Patient
testimonials.quote: The pharmacy team at The Nairobi Hospital has been incredibly helpful in managing my medications.

title: Laboratory Services
tagline: Accurate results for better health decisions.
overview: State-of-the-art lab offering fast, precise diagnostic tests to support effective medical decisions.
detailedDescription: Our laboratory uses advanced equipment to deliver accurate results, aiding in disease diagnosis, monitoring, and preventive care.

features.title: Comprehensive diagnostic testing
features.description: Full range of blood, urine, and molecular tests for accurate diagnosis.

features.title: Qualified laboratory technologists
features.description: Experienced technologists ensure proper sample handling and analysis.

doctors.name: Dr. Jane Doe
doctors.title: Lab Technologist
doctors.bio: Dr. Jane Doe is a laboratory scientist specializing in clinical chemistry and hematology.

testimonials.name: Michael Kimani
testimonials.title: Satisfied Patient
testimonials.quote: The laboratory services are efficient and reliable. I always get my results on time.

title: Radiology Services
overview: High-quality imaging services including MRI, CT, and X-rays to support accurate medical diagnoses.
detailedDescription: Our radiology department provides advanced imaging for precise diagnosis, aiding treatment planning with minimal patient discomfort.

features.title: Ultrasound imaging
features.description: Safe and detailed imaging for internal organs and prenatal care.

doctors.name: Dr. Jane Doe
doctors.title: Radiologist
doctors.bio: Expert in radiologic imaging with focus on oncology diagnostics.

testimonials.name: Peter Otieno
testimonials.title: Patient
testimonials.quote: Radiology services were efficient, and the staff was very professional.

title: Dental Services
tagline: Bright smiles, healthy teeth, happy patients.
overview: Full-spectrum dental care for all ages, offering cleanings, restorative, and cosmetic dentistry services.
detailedDescription: Our dental clinic provides gentle, professional care including orthodontics, pediatric dentistry, and cosmetic procedures for lasting oral health.

features.title: Cosmetic dentistry
features.description: Enhancing smiles with whitening, veneers, and aesthetic restorations.

features.title: Pediatric dental care
features.description: Child-focused dental care ensuring healthy teeth from early years.

doctors.name: Dr. Jane Doe
doctors.title: Dentist
doctors.bio: Dr. Jane Doe is a dentist with 12 years of experience in restorative and cosmetic dentistry.

testimonials.name: Emily Njeri
testimonials.title: Patient
testimonials.quote: The dental team was amazing — gentle, professional, and thorough.

title: Antenatal Services
tagline: Caring for you and your baby every step of the way.
overview: Comprehensive prenatal care including check-ups, ultrasounds, counseling, and birth preparation support.
detailedDescription: Our antenatal services focus on maternal and fetal health, offering routine monitoring, nutrition advice, and preparation for safe delivery.

features.title: Ultrasound and fetal monitoring
features.description: Ensures accurate tracking of baby’s growth and health throughout pregnancy.

doctors.name: Dr. Jane Doe
doctors.title: Obstetrician
doctors.bio: Specialist in maternal and fetal medicine with over 15 years of experience.

testimonials.name: Grace Mwende
testimonials.title: Patient
testimonials.quote: The antenatal clinic provided exceptional care throughout my pregnancy.

title: Physiotherapy Services
tagline: Regain mobility, restore strength, live fully.
overview: Therapy programs to restore strength, improve mobility, and aid recovery from injuries or surgeries.
detailedDescription: Our physiotherapy department offers individualized rehabilitation plans, including post-surgery recovery, sports injury management, and chronic pain relief.

features.title: Post-surgery rehabilitation
features.description: Tailored exercises to regain mobility and strength after operations.

doctors.name: Dr. John Smith
doctors.title: Physiotherapist
doctors.bio: Dr. John Smith specializes in orthopedic and sports rehabilitation.

testimonials.name: Kevin Otieno
testimonials.title: Patient
testimonials.quote: The physiotherapy sessions helped me regain strength faster than expected.

title: Oncology Services
tagline: Compassionate care for every stage of treatment.
overview: Comprehensive cancer care including diagnosis, chemotherapy, radiation, and patient support services.
detailedDescription: Our oncology department provides advanced, patient-centered care covering diagnosis, treatment planning, therapy, and emotional support throughout the cancer journey.

features.title: Chemotherapy and radiation
features.description: Safe and monitored treatment plans tailored to each patient.

doctors.name: Dr. Jane Doe
doctors.title: Oncologist
doctors.bio: Dr. Jane Doe specializes in medical oncology and patient-centered cancer care.
